TLifetimeType Enumeration

Summary

Lifetime Type Enumeration.

Namespace: Spring.Container.Common
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TLifetimeType = (
 Unknown,
 Singleton,
 Transient,
 PerResolve,
 SingletonPerThread,
 Pooled,
 Custom
 );

The TLifetimeType type exposes the following members.

Members
Show:
 NameDescription
Custom

Customized lifetime type.

PerResolve

Once per resolve operation.

Pooled

Instances are transient except that they are recyclable.

Singleton

Single instance.

SingletonPerThread

Every thread has a single instance.

Transient

Different instances.

Unknown

Unknown lifetime type.
